reference_a:
@article{habets2020,
  title = {Mobile health daily life monitoring for parkinson disease: {{Development}} and validation of ecological momentary assessments},
  shorttitle = {Mobile health daily life monitoring for parkinson disease},
  author = {Habets, Jeroen and Heijmans, Margot and Herff, Christian and Simons, Claudia and Leentjens, Albert FG and Temel, Yasin and Kuijf, Mark and Kubben, Pieter},
  date = {2020-05-11},
  journaltitle = {JMIR mHealth and uHealth},
  volume = {8},
  number = {5},
  pages = {e15628},
  publisher = {JMIR Publications Inc., Toronto, Canada},
  doi = {10.2196/15628}
}
additional_comments: some variables only morning/evening; no beep information available

features.name: beep
features.coding: NA

features.name: well
features.coding:
I feel well
1 = not at all
7 = very
features.source: Parkinson Disease Ecological Momentary Assessment Questionnaire

features.name: down
features.coding:
I feel down
1 = not at all
7 = very
features.source: Parkinson Disease Ecological Momentary Assessment Questionnaire

features.name: frightened
features.coding:
I feel frightened
1 = not at all
7 = very
features.source: Parkinson Disease Ecological Momentary Assessment Questionnaire
features.construct: fear, negative affect, affect, neuroticism, big five

features.name: tense
features.coding:
I feel tense
1 = not at all
7 = very
features.source: Parkinson Disease Ecological Momentary Assessment Questionnaire
features.construct: tense, negative affect, affect, neuroticism, big five

features.name: sleepy
features.coding:
I feel sleepy
1 = not at all
7 = very
features.source: Parkinson Disease Ecological Momentary Assessment Questionnaire

features.name: tired
features.coding:
I am tired
1 = not at all
7 = very
features.source: Parkinson Disease Ecological Momentary Assessment Questionnaire
features.construct: tiredness, negative affect, affect, biological, psychopathology

features.name: cheerful
features.coding:
I feel cheerful
1 = not at all
7 = very
features.source: Parkinson Disease Ecological Momentary Assessment Questionnaire

features.name: relaxed
features.coding:
I feel relaxed
1 = not at all
7 = very
features.source: Parkinson Disease Ecological Momentary Assessment Questionnaire
features.construct: relaxation, positive affect, affect, neuroticism, big five

features.name: concentrate
features.coding:
I can concentrate well
1 = not at all
7 = very
features.source: Parkinson Disease Ecological Momentary Assessment Questionnaire
features.construct: concentration, cognitive functioning, nonmotor symptoms, parkinson disease,

features.name: hallucinations
features.coding:
I experience hallucinations
1 = not at all
7 = very
features.source: Parkinson Disease Ecological Momentary Assessment Questionnaire

features.name: loc_where
features.coding:
I am at...
10=Home
20 = Family's
25 = Friends
30 = Work
55 = A public place
70 = Traveling
90 = Somewhere else
features.labels:
10 = Home
20 = Family's
25 = Friends
30 = Work
55 = A public place
70 = Traveling
90 = Somewhere else
features.source: Parkinson Disease Ecological Momentary Assessment Questionnaire

features.name: soc_who
features.coding:

30 = Friends

50 = Strangers

50 = Strangers

features.name: act_what
features.coding:

41 = sports
89 = something else
00 = nothing

features.name: parkinson_onoff
features.coding:
Currently, I feel...
1 = Off
2 = Changing from off towards on
3 = On
4 = Changing from on to off
features.labels:
1 = Off
2 = Changing from off towards on
3 = On
4 = Changing from on to off
features.source: Parkinson Disease Ecological Momentary Assessment Questionnaire
features.construct: ON/OFF state, medication effect, mediation, parkinson disease

features.name: parkinson_medication
features.coding:
I took Parkinson medication since the last beep
1 = Yes
2 = No
3 = I don't know
features.details: I took Parkinson medication since the last beep
features.source: Parkinson Disease Ecological Momentary Assessment Questionnaire

features.name: beep_disturbing
features.coding:
This beep was disturbing
1 = not at all
7 = very

I slept well
Morning only
1 = not at all
7 = very

Morning only

7 = very

7 = very

7 = very

features.name: mor_tired_ment
features.coding:
I feel mentally tired
Morning only

7 = very
features.details:
I feel mentally tired
Morning only
features.source: Parkinson Disease Ecological Momentary Assessment Questionnaire
features.construct: mental fatigue, fatigue, negative affect, affect

features.name: eve_many_offs
features.coding:
I had many off-periods today
Evening only
1 = not at all
7 = very
features.details:
I had many off-periods today
Evening only
features.transformation: off-moment severity during the day is calculated as the average of eve_many_offs and eve_long_offs
features.source: Parkinson Disease Ecological Momentary Assessment Questionnaire
features.construct: off-period frequency, medication effect, medication, parkinson disease

features.name: eve_long_offs
features.coding:
I had long off-periods today
Evening only
1 = not at all
7 = very
features.details:

Evening only
features.source: Parkinson Disease Ecological Momentary Assessment Questionnaire
features.construct: off-period frequency, medication effect, medication, parkinson disease
